casebody.data:
STATE of Louisiana
v.
Kevin PITTS NO. 2018-KH-0415 Supreme Court of Louisiana. February 25, 2019

Denied. Applicant has previously exhausted his right to state collateral review and fails to show that any exception permits his successive filing. See State ex rel. Pitts v. State, 15-0329 (La. 11/20/15), 178 So.3d 984.
